material.mattext: Of the two scenarios that will be considered in this module, which one is a case of simple regression, and which is a case of multiple regression?

Scenario (III) has only one explanatory variable (number of beers), and therefore this is a case of simple regression. Scenario (I) has 4 explanatory variables (two midterm scores, HW average, and whether or not the Student turned in the extra credit assignment. Note that in this case the first three explanatory variables are quantitative and the fourth is categorical. Remember, categorical explanatory variables are OK.
